markdownRemark.html:
Hi! My name is Dmitry, but friends call me Mitya.

I was born in Moscow, Russia. I lived there for 30 year, and in 2014 I decided to move to Israel.

Got Master Degree in BMSTU. I’m a Software Developer, now I mostly use Scala, but previously wrote a lot in C++, Java and C#. I’m trying to share the knowledge as much as I can, this is why I write blog posts from time to time (when I actually have some time).

In Moscow I worked at Yandex for 4 years, in Israel I work in Wix.
